name: Earthen Sky
description:
Lil first person parkour game. Mirror's Edge + fantasy Nepal. Currently consists of a half-complete prototype level. Windows only.

Controls:

Mouselook, WASD to move

Space to jump

R to reset at checkpoint, Backspace to restart level, Esc to exit

Jump at walls head on to climb, or at an angle to wallrun.

You can jump off of a wallrun/climb, and chain up to three wallrun/climbs before touching the ground (though you can't climb three times in a row,  and you can't climb/wallrun off the same wall twice in a row). It works the same as Mirror's Edge Catalyst, for the approximately zero people that have played that game.
